name: Ghost Squid
description:
Little prototype game where the octopus boi swims above and below the surface collecting ink bombs to smack away those damn jelly fish! Find the anchor and bring it to its final destination! Your little ghost buddy will accompany you on your journey! go underwater and fight those jelly fish!!! Survive!! float around silly octoboi!

How to play the game:
Step 1. Download the game
Step 2. Open the game
Step 3. Play the game! 

  • You must find ink bombs when starting the game
  • Press [F] top use ink bomb 
  • Anchor: Collide into it to automatically pick it up. 
    • If you find the anchor drop off before the anchor, A drop off zone will be marked

It's confusing playing the game when you start, but the more you play....then you realise....ohhhhh you get it now!

.....find the easter egg? or a bug? or both?.....
